longBusinessSummary: Mohit Industries Limited engages in manufacturing texturized yarn from partially oriented yarn and weaving of yarn to grey cloth in India. It offers yarn, grey, and fabric products; and exports polyester draw texturized yarns. The company also exports its products to West and South East Asia, the United Kingdom, Italy, Spain, Germany, Mexico, Thailand, Peru, Bangladesh, South Africa, Egypt, Brazil, Colombia, Guatemala, Vietnam, Indonesia, Bulgaria, Uzbekistan, Chili, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Surat, India.
